title: Trying to improve before end of season?  Masters player doing coaching
body: Hey all Mister Lau here, have been coaching for quite a while now and have been quite successful in helping a lot of people improve and climb in their ranking. Looking to take on more students and help them improve at the game and be able to enjoy it more. If interested add me in game for more info.

replies.body: Hes using the forums as a means to advertise and profit. I am sure this is against the TOS.
I would be very grateful to learning how to play the game from whomever, but to warn I don't have any money.
This is not a free service , He will charge like 50 $ a hour for basic stuff,  that i can tell you for free lol

I am currently in b5 from b1 and am getting silver tomorrow. I am very hard working and would love to get a chance to have you help me, my goal is to get gold this season. Thank you for your consideration. My username is Ezenya if you wish to add me.
Im in! just trying to get to Plat before the end of the season (IM G2 right now)
